TO THE LIMIT

How to Play

You play as three (3) community facilitators, who is trying to help a community monster that is having a hard time right now.

Try different ways to help our monster, and see what works.

Press Enter or Space to choose menu items, dismiss dialogue boxes, and choose attacks. Escape goes to main menu.

After three (3) rounds, a LIMIT BREAK occurs and your group of facilitators will need to pick what kind of help our monster most needs.

Perhaps you'll help our monster flourish today! If not, that's ok too. Either way, our monster knows you'll all be there when they're ready to seek help again, and you can keep trying with other community monsters in other situations.

Strive for better, not perfection.

Thanks for playing! Please follow Aldercone for future updates to To The Limit and our other projects!

<3
